method: Chop the tomatoes and fruit into the same sized chunks - about ½cm/¼in.  Mix in a large bowl with the rest of the ingredients.  Leave to stand for 30 minutes to let all the flavours merge.
ingredients: 225g/8oz tomatoes, deseeded,  1 red onion, peeled and finely chopped or 4 spring onions, trimmed and sliced ,  finely,  1 jalapeno chilli, de-veined, de-seeded and finely chopped ,  225g/8oz fresh ripe fruit such as melon, mango, papaya, pineapple, peach ,  large bunch of fresh coriander, chopped roughly ,  1 lemon, zest and juice (or 2 limes)
